rooms.description: North-facing entrance hall with an open foyer that leads to the main living spaces. The design adheres to Vastu principles, ensuring a positive energy flow.
Spacious living area with large windows facing the north for abundant natural light, integrated smart home features and eco-friendly insulation.
Modern dining area adjacent to the living room with ample natural light and energy-efficient design.
Fully equipped kitchen designed with eco-friendly appliances, proper ventilation, and efficient space utilization. The design incorporates Vastu principles for functionality.
Dedicated area for storage and small household appliances, designed to support a sustainable lifestyle.
A private gym with energy-efficient equipment and proper ventilation, optimized for personal fitness routines in an eco-conscious setting.
Compact living area for the servants, ensuring privacy and comfort while adhering to local building norms and sustainable design practices.

openings.description: Large, inviting door with energy-efficient glazing and eco-friendly design ensuring optimal natural lighting.
Dedicated entry for the two-car garage, designed with reinforced materials and sustainable construction techniques.

garage.description: Well-insulated two-car garage integrated into the building structure with sustainable design features.

eco_features: Solar panels on the roof for energy efficiency.
Natural ventilation and insulation for reduced energy consumption.
